name: Steel Your Resolve
summary: Regain Stamina Points equal to half your maximum.
description:
Regain Stamina Points equal to half your maximum.Traits

General: A type of feat that any character can select, regardless of ancestry and class, as long as they meet the prerequisites. You can select a feat with this trait when your class grants a general feat.

Stamina: Available for use in games using the Stamina Rules Variant.
